page.topic: Exporting a Table to the Back-End
page.description: This example will show how to export the Alpha Anywhere AlphaSports customer table to the Access AlphaSports database. First, dimension two variables.

section.example: dim conn as sql::connection dim resultmsg as C = ""

section.description: Open the connection to the database. If an error occurs, display a message and end the script.
section.example: if .not. conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") then ui_msg_box("Error", "Could not establish connection" + crlf()+ conn.CallResult.text) end end if

section.description: Create the target table and copy the data with SQL_TableExport().
Find out if there was an error.
